Text: Thanks for the download, although I can't get the crack to work, any suggestions? When I open the program it doesn't load..

On XP my friend had to run the original exe once first, then run the hacked exe.

When he ran the hacked exe first it just hung at the splash screen.

Thanks rok.

I only used the crack to unlock the version i downloaded from the pcstitch site. Worked like a charm tho. I ran the program beforehand too. 

I've had a lot of bad luck with my stich programs before, and i'm super happy to have it finally working properly. Thanks a lot!
